## toggleWrap variable

Toggle between wrapping an inactive node with the provided node type, and lifting it up into it's parent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toggleWrap: (type: import("prosemirror-model").NodeType<any>, attrs?: Record<string, unknown> | undefined) => CommandFunction<any>
```
